item.description:
Let's meet in Fanueuil Hall for Dinner at Cheers then walk around the marketplace.

Whether its Rebecca's Fish & Chips, Carla's Pasta Caprese or a Norm burger, Cheers has it all plus entertainment in the TV show style atmosphere.

Come on down and eat at Cheer's with us,take in some of the entertainment then we can walk around the Marketplace and either shop or people watch.

We will meet at the Bar entrance at 5:15 and plan on getting a table by 5:30pm. If you can not find us, or are running late, please call the meetup cell phone at 978-304-2811

Hope to see you where everyone knows your name
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the entrance by the bar
item.name: Dinner at Cheers in Faneuil Hall Marketplace
